Content: The grip or leumluath (lem-loo-ah) is a movement from Low G, "D" grace note, Low G, back to the melody note. Like the D throw, it is important to play the first Low G clearly. Notice that the grip on a D uses a B instead of a D grace note.
Source: Highland Bagpipe Tutor Student Manual, 4th Edition
Author: Dr. Peter L. Heineman
